SQL.LOAD: SELECT oc_template_group_id, dealer_id, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, oc_template_group_dealer_id FROM elp_oc_template_group_dealer WHERE oc_template_group_dealer_id = :oc_template_group_dealer_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST_BY_TEMPLATE_GROUP_ID: SELECT oc_template_group_id, dealer_id, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, oc_template_group_dealer_id FROM elp_oc_template_group_dealer WHERE oc_template_group_id = :oc_template_group_id
SQL.GET_ASSOCIATED_TEMPLATE_GROUP_COUNT: select count(oc_template_group_id) number_of_template_groups from elp_oc_template_group_dealer where dealer_id = :dealer_id and oc_template_group_id <> :oc_template_group_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_oc_template_group_dealer SET oc_template_group_id = :oc_template_group_id, dealer_id = :dealer_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE oc_template_group_dealer_id = :oc_template_group_dealer_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_oc_template_group_dealer ( oc_template_group_id, dealer_id, created_by, oc_template_group_dealer_id ) VALUES ( :oc_template_group_id, :dealer_id, :created_by, :oc_template_group_dealer_id )
